overview.title: About Size Converter
overview.content: Our size converter allows you to quickly and accurately convert clothing and shoe sizes between different international systems. Supports all major categories: clothing, jeans, shoes, bras and accessories.

calculation.title: How Conversion Works
calculation.content: All sizes are converted based on international standards. Each category has its own conversion tables, ensuring accurate translation between RU, EU, US, UK, JP, CN systems.

categories.title: Supported Categories
categories.content: The converter supports 6 main categories: clothing, jeans, shoes, bras, hats and gloves. Men's, women's and children's sizes are available for each category.

advantages.title: Advantages of Our Converter
advantages.content: Accurate size tables, instant conversion, 4 languages support, user-friendly interface, mobile version.
